final.title: Success
final.description: You've successfully completed all the steps.
final.description_sharing: Your wallet has been created to receive your **{{ productName }}** reward for sharing. To find your wallet, go to [wallet.frak.id](https://wallet.frak.id).
final.description_reward: Check your earnings at any time on [wallet.frak.id](https://wallet.frak.id). You too can share with your friends, all your shares that lead to clicks, registrations or purchases generate new earnings!

login.description: Login to your Frak account to get the best experience on **{{ productName }}**
login.description_sharing: {{ productName }} pays you directly on your **wallet** for the value you create if your shares lead to actions such as clicks, registrations or purchases.
login.description_reward: {{ productName }} pays you directly into your **wallets** for the value you create through actions on this site, such as clicks, registrations or purchases.
login.secondaryAction: Use a QR code to connect
login.title: Connection

openSession.description: Congratulations, your wallet has been created! Click on the button below to activate it and receive your winnings.
openSession.title: Activation

sendTransaction.description: To complete, authorize this transaction in your wallet. This ensures secure processing.
sendTransaction.title: Transaction

siweAuthenticate.description: Please authenticate with your wallet to proceed securely. Your signature confirms your identity.
siweAuthenticate.title: Authentication

login.text: Create your wallet and receive up to **{{ estimatedReward }}** per referred friend
login.text_referred:
Welcome! Receive up to **{{ estimatedReward }}** in case of purchase on the site.

Create your wallet in 1 click
